itemDisplayName: Deploy N Linux VMs and set up Ansible so you can easily manage all the VMs
description: Manage your  Linux VMs efficiently using Ansible.This advanced template deploys N number of Linux VMs and it configures Ansible and SSH.Then using an Ansible playbook it will create a RAID with all the available data disks
summary: This advanced template deploys N number of Linux VMs and it configures Ansible so you can easily manage all the VMS.Additionally,it will execute an ansible Playbook to create a RAID with all the available data disks. Don't suffer more pain configuring and managing all your VMs , just use Ansible! Ansible is a very powerful masterless configuration management system based on SSH.Do you need 1 or 10 or 100 VMs? It won't make any difference with Ansible
